title: Wise Mind Exercises
introText: Wise Mind is the balance between emotion and reason. Use these exercises to access your inner wisdom and make decisions from a place of clarity and balance.

exercises.title: Wise Mind Practice
exercises.description: 3-step guided meditation to access your inner wisdom through breathing, visualization, and reflection.

exercises.title: Past Decisions
exercises.description: Reflect on past decisions and explore how Wise Mind could have influenced your choices.

exercises.title: Finding Your Inner Wisdom
exercises.description: Wise Mind isn't about having all the answersâ€”it's about finding balance between your thoughts and feelings. Trust the wisdom that emerges when you create space for both emotion and reason.
